data.name: roblox detective anime girl theme
Scammer.info Purple/Gold
data.description:
This theme is still in its earliest beta!
There will be bugs and graphical issues. Post them on the comments below or talk to me on discord! 

Since this theme is being used by quite a few people. I will continue to update it monthly. :)

Features:
-Has a custom cursor!
-Darker Color
-Transparent Menus


To Do:
-Make a new logo to fit current theme ☑
-Overhaul Colors ☑
-Rebuild Layouts 
-Make Mobile Friendly

Currently Broken:
-Some Text is unreadable in Settings
-Other colors yet to have been applied

data.name: Connexus Modern(ish)
data.description: A (more) modern theme for Connexus (Connections Education, EMS).  Changes the right sidebar to a light grey (can be changed easily in the CSS); adds some shadows and border radius to certain parts and increases contrast in places.  Mainly changes the Connexus homepage, but now has large changes to lessons and minor changes to other pages.

user.name: Joshua A Klabunde
user.about: I live in Indiana, and go to Indiana Connections Academy - an online charter school.  My dad is a web developer, mostly in PHP and other back-end things, and he taught me some simple CSS when I was about ten.  Ever since, I've been adding to my well of knowledge in this stylish coding language.
